item.title: Règlement Génnéral sur la protection des Données
item.description: Date de publication : April 17, 2018 Date de dernière mise à jour : May 26, 2018 Introduction Dans un monde de plus en plus tourné vers le numérique, vers les nouvelles technologies, la donnée est une devenue l’or noir du XXIe siècle. Mais depuis le début du siècle, le nombre de cyber-attaque ne cesse d’augmenter. Les révélations d’Ed. Swoden ont ebrallé le monde. Le piratage des 3 milliards de compte de Yahoo et plus récemment l’affaire Cambridge Analityca avec Facebook.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Issa Sanogo. This is my personnel website. For more information about me, go on my homepage or consult my resume. This blog is about statistics, data in general with a special focus on R and open source software. As Errare humanum est, some post certainly contain error so please feel free to push a correction request directly on Github. This site has been created with blogdown and the theme is hugo-sustain, a Hugo theme.

item.title: Consulting
item.description: Get in touch if you have a project in mind. I’d love to discuss about it and figure out how I can help you. Data science You have a data science project but you don’t have the time or expertise to complete it? I can help you. Data analysis is a real passion for me. I can also assist you in doing your project by yourself by setting up coaching sessions.

item.title: Contact
item.description: The best way to reach me is by email at ngsanogo@gmail.com. You can contact me about anything but if it’s about programming, I advise you to post it on Stack Overflow instead. You’ll have all the answers you are looking for and even better answer for sure. The Kamita association hold events every first Saturday of the month. So if you want to meet me, check on the association’s website or on assomaliennes.

item.title: Project
item.description: Here are the projects I have worked on or I’m working on: Website This project is about building a website with hugo and blogdown. The source code is hosting on github.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Pulblished: April 15, 2018 Last update: May 26, 2018 Contact information Email: ngsanogo@gmail.com LinkdIn: Issa Sanogo Twitter: ngsanogo Adress: Suresnes, 92150, France Short biography I am Issa Sanogo, I am malian. I am a huge nerd passioned by data science. I love learning and teaching. I am in favor of popularizing sience. After beeing graduated of bachelor’s degree in Mali I came in France to do my graduate studies.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I’m willing to teach either at university or in private courses. I think science must not be an occult thing. I can offer custom R training at your location. if you have a specific need in mind, contact me and we can work on a program together.
